snippet: Only 148 cases of Guinea worm disease, which is on the brink of extinction, were found in the world in 2013, the Carter Center announced.
abstract: Carter Center says only 148 cases of Guinea worm disease were found in world in 2013, 73 percent drop from the 542 cases found one year earlier; says disease is hovering on brink of extinction with fewer than 1,000 cases annually worldwide.
lead_paragraph: Only 148 cases of Guinea worm disease, which is on the brink of extinction, were found in the world in 2013, the Carter Center announced.

headline.main: Guinea Worm Said to Infect Few in 2013
headline.print_headline: Guinea Worm Said to Infect Few in 2013
